title: Quick cast
body: When i see a pro player stream they use quick cast but are still able to see their range indicator on the spell still. How do i do that?

replies.body: What Neon Wolf said. Kind of unintuitive that it's listed below the advanced configuration, instead of below the quick binds.
Go in-game, open up your options with 'Esc', and where you find your key bindings and such, scroll down and you'll find a tick box saying "Quick cast with indicator". Click that and enjoy! ^w^
